SEARCH
Module org.junit.platform.console
Package org.junit.platform.console.tasks

Enum Class CustomClassLoaderCloseStrategy

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<CustomClassLoaderCloseStrategy>
org.junit.platform.console.tasks.CustomClassLoaderCloseStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<CustomClassLoaderCloseStrategy>, Constable
@API(status=INTERNAL, since="1.13") public enum CustomClassLoaderCloseStrategy extends Enum<CustomClassLoaderCloseStrategy>
Defines the strategy for closing custom class loaders created for test discovery and execution.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    CLOSE_AFTER_CALLING_LAUNCHER
    Close the custom class loader after calling the Launcher for test discovery or execution.
    KEEP_OPEN
    Rely on the JVM to release resources held by the custom class loader when it terminates.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • CLOSE_AFTER_CALLING_LAUNCHER

      public static final CustomClassLoaderCloseStrategy CLOSE_AFTER_CALLING_LAUNCHER
      Close the custom class loader after calling the Launcher for test discovery or execution.

    • KEEP_OPEN

      public static final CustomClassLoaderCloseStrategy KEEP_OPEN
      Rely on the JVM to release resources held by the custom class loader when it terminates.

      This mode is only safe to use when calling System.exit(int) afterward.
